dao

Interface IDictionary

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dictionary

    public interface IDictionary
    Defines methods a dictionary needs to provide.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PostingsList addTerm(java.lang.String new_term)
      Adds the term new_term to the dictionary and returns a new (i.e. empty) postings list for this term.
      PostingsList getPostingsList(java.lang.String term_in_dictionary)
      Returns the postings list for the term term_in_dictionary or null if term_in_dictionary is not in the dictionary.
      void sortTerms()
      Sorts the terms in the dictionary.
      void writeToDisk(java.io.File outputFile, int lowThresh, int highThresh)
      Writes the current dictionary to the specified output file while omitting terms which occur too rarely / too often.

    • Method Detail

      • addTerm

        PostingsList addTerm(java.lang.String new_term)
        Adds the term new_term to the dictionary and returns a new (i.e. empty) postings list for this term.
        Parameters:
        new_term - The term to add to the dictionary.
        Returns:
        The newly created, empty postings list.

      • getPostingsList

        PostingsList getPostingsList(java.lang.String term_in_dictionary)
        Returns the postings list for the term term_in_dictionary or null if term_in_dictionary is not in the dictionary.
        Parameters:
        term_in_dictionary - The term of the postings list to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The postings list of the specified term of null if the term is not in the dictionary.

      • sortTerms

        void sortTerms()
        Sorts the terms in the dictionary.

      • writeToDisk

        void writeToDisk(java.io.File outputFile,
               int lowThresh,
               int highThresh)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the current dictionary to the specified output file while omitting terms which occur too rarely / too often. Note that you usually want to call sortTerms prior to calling this method.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - The file to write the dictionary to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
